page.title: 05OLD MINE WORKINGS...
page.content: In this square the land slopes from west to east with the Greenbank estate on one side of the St.Bees road and Mirehouse in the valley.All the south-western quarter consists of fields with no buildings on it whatsoever.There was an old coalmine around but it ceased working in 1849.The road is known locally as Wilson Pit Road and an old air shaft in the field probably belonged to this pit.The area is honeycombed with old mine workings.The Mirehouse housing estate was built in stages between 1948 and 1956 and is almost entirely council owned.
